name: Thrust & Shoot : Flight School
description: Master a new way to fly and fight. Control every movement and engine burn. Simple controls, realistic flight: a game for space fans by a space fan.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities Storage: 2048 MB available space
